perturbation.original_text: 4.2 Payment for the Products shall be in U.S. Dollars, or such other currency as STAAR may require in its sole discretion, and made within thirty (30) days of STAAR's invoice. Late payments shall be subject to an interest charge of 1% per month or the maximum amount permitted by applicable law, whichever is less.
perturbation.changed_text: 4.2 Payment for the Products shall be in U.S. Dollars, or such other currency as STAAR may require in its sole discretion, and made within forty-five (45) days of STAAR's invoice. Late payments shall be subject to an interest charge of 1% per month or the maximum amount permitted by applicable law, whichever is less.
perturbation.explanation: The change in payment terms from 'thirty (30) days' to 'forty-five (45) days' introduces a contradiction with potential clauses added later that might specify shorter payment windows or penalties for payments delayed past 30 days. This creates ambiguity regarding the actual payment deadline.

perturbation.original_text: 7.2 Distributor shall order Products from STAAR under this Agreement by submitting to STAAR a written purchase order specifying Products, quantities, and requested delivery dates to enable STAAR to fill the order. Each purchase order submitted to STAAR is subject to acceptance by STAAR at its offices to which such order was submitted. The purpose of the purchase order to be issued under this Agreement is for scheduling only; no terms and conditions of Distributor's purchase orders or any other document or instrument of Distributor shall be binding upon STAAR or amend or modify this Agreement in any manner, notwithstanding any language to the contrary contained in any such purchase order, instrument or document. Distributor should place its last order in each quarter by the tenth day of the last month in each quarter (e.g., March 10, June 10, September 10, and December 10).
perturbation.changed_text: 7.2 Distributor shall order Products from STAAR under this Agreement by submitting to STAAR a written purchase order specifying Products, quantities, and requested delivery dates to enable STAAR to fill the order. Each purchase order submitted to STAAR is subject to acceptance by STAAR at its offices to which such order was submitted. The purpose of the purchase order to be issued under this Agreement is for scheduling only; no terms and conditions of Distributor's purchase orders or any other document or instrument of Distributor shall be binding upon STAAR or amend or modify this Agreement in any manner, notwithstanding any language to the contrary contained in any such purchase order, instrument or document. Distributor must place its last order in each quarter by the fifteenth day of the last month in each quarter (e.g., March 15, June 15, September 15, and December 15).
perturbation.explanation: Changing the order deadline from the 'tenth day' to the 'fifteenth day' of the last month in each quarter creates a direct contradiction, making it unclear when the final order must be placed. This could cause disputes over order fulfillment and timing.

perturbation.original_text: 14.3 Notwithstanding the provisions of Section 3 above, either party shall have the right to terminate this Agreement, without cause, upon no less than ninety (90) days' prior written notice to the other party.
perturbation.changed_text: 14.3 Notwithstanding the provisions of Section 3 above, either party shall have the right to terminate this Agreement, without cause, upon no less than sixty (60) days' prior written notice to the other party.
perturbation.explanation: Reducing the termination notice period from 'ninety (90) days' to 'sixty (60) days' presents conflicting termination terms, creating ambiguity about the proper notice period required for termination without cause.
